rissimae sunt.

Maitialis usum 11999 sabula 9119111111. Do vorbis 9991111191 ds
praepositionibus monosyllabis vido quas ad clausulas hexametri
monul.

E = pentasyllaba, F x: hexasyllaba.

Clausulas monosyllabas bisin versibus exstant: I 29141 3221
1ηωωηψ9999Νωη9999η991

70161 X 17181 56181 XI 2181 XII 46121 54121 6816.

Clausulas eiusmodi 99191191191119119111191111999111111 9911 maxims
displicent num non praeeedit allorum monosyllabum, 1111 29141
32121 115812111195141 V 62181 VII 4112151161 76121 81121 90141 VIII
29121 X 11181 XI 2181 XII 46125412 (011.Ζ911111911111. 1. p. 250).

labao, quas his loois exstant: Sp. l. 21121 2511141 26181 1151121
